weka.dl4j.iterators.instance

Class ConvolutionInstanceIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.AbstractInstanceIterator
      • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.DefaultInstanceIterator
        • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.ConvolutionInstanceIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ConvolutionalIterator

    public class ConvolutionInstanceIterator
extends DefaultInstanceIterator
implements ConvolutionalIterator
    Converts the given Instances object into a DataSet and then constructs and returns a DefaultDataSetIterator. This iterator is designed for training convolutional networks on data that is represented as standard WEKA instances. It enables specification of filter width and height, and number of channels.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • enforceValidForZooModel

        public void enforceValidForZooModel(AbstractZooModel tmpZooModel)
                             throws WrongIteratorException
        The only one-channel zoo model currently implemented is Dl4JLeNet. If the user tries using any other zoo models with a 1D ConvolutionInstanceIterator, throw an exception
        Parameters:
        tmpZooModel - zoo model we need to check against
        Throws:
        WrongIteratorException
